article: Betty is Australian and Sally is  _  Australian girl too. They are in the same school.  _  houses are far from school. So they get up  _  in the morning and  _  the early bus after breakfast. Sometimes they have lunch in the  _ . Betty likes hamburgers and meat,  _  Sally likes vegetables and fruit. She thinks they are  _ . After lunch Betty goes to play the  _  and Sally goes to the classroom. She sings English songs or  listens to  music. This weekend, they are going to have a picnic with John and Mike. They  will meet  in the park at one o'clock.
